levels.name: level-00
levels.description: Fundamental vulnerability labs for absolute beginners

labs.name: xss-1
labs.description: Professional user profile management system with XSS vulnerability
labs.objective: Exploit XSS vulnerability to execute arbitrary JavaScript code

labs.name: cve-2014-6271
labs.description: System status monitoring application with CGI
labs.objective: Obtain remote code execution via Shellshock vulnerability

labs.name: jwt-1
labs.description: Secure web application with JWT authentication
labs.objective: Bypass authentication to gain admin access via JWT manipulation

labs.name: sqli-1
labs.description: News portal application with database vulnerabilities
labs.objective: Exploit SQL injection to gain admin access and execute commands

labs.name: pickle
labs.description: Secure web application with user authentication and session management
labs.objective: Exploit pickle deserialization to gain remote code execution

levels.name: level-02
levels.description: Intermediate vulnerability labs for experienced users

labs.name: cve-2016-10033
labs.description: Professional contact form application with email functionality
labs.objective: Exploit PHPMailer vulnerability to achieve remote code execution

labs.name: jwt-2
labs.description: Secure enterprise portal with JWT authentication vulnerability
labs.objective: Exploit JWT algorithm confusion to bypass authentication and gain admin access
